pageContext.claim: “You saw the mayor or Tijuana. He said, ‘These are tough people. You talk to them and we end up in fights. These are tough people.’”
pageContext.analysis: Tensions are high in Tijuana, where many members of the Central American migrant caravan have camped out. But in some cases, these incidents seem to be caused by Tijuana residents protesting the caravan's stay in their city. The city's mayor is an anti-immigrant politician who does not have a record of accurate remarks about the caravan.
